title: Alex Cunningham – 2023 Comments on the Abolition of the TeesFlex Bus Service
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Alex Cunningham, the Labour MP for Stockton North, on Twitter on 23 January 2023.
content:
I’m hearing today that Mayor [Ben] Houchen is axing the TeesFlex bus service – I’d ask if it was true but he ignores my letters and has blocked me from social media.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
